```{r include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo=TRUE, comment=NA)
options(
    # Make width wide enough to prevent wrapping of output
    width=10000,
    # Prevent scientific notation
    scipen=10000,
    # Round to 2 decimal points
    digits=2
)
```
